articles.title: Security Breach Near Trump's Rally: Averted Assassination Plot?
articles.description: A man was arrested at a checkpoint near Donald Trump's California rally for possessing firearms, fake license plate, and multiple passports. articles.title: Security Breach at Trump Rally: Arrest Made
articles.description: A Nevada man with weapons and fake passports was arrested at a security checkpoint outside Donald Trump's rally in Southern California.
